select BASE_DT ,CUST_NM /*,PHONE_NO*/ ,CASE WHEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',2),'-',-1)) = #{PHONE_NO} OR CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',-1)) = #{PHONE_NO} THEN CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',1)),'-', CASE WHEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',2),'-',-1)) = #{PHONE_NO} THEN '****' ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',2),'-',-1)) END,'-', CASE WHEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',-1)) = #{PHONE_NO} THEN '****' ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',-1)) END ) ELSE CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',1)),'-****',CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PHONE_NO,'-',-1))) END AS PHONE_NO ,BIRTH_YMD ,SALARY_DIV_NM ,ING_DIV_NM ,COUNTRY_NM ,INCOME_AMT ,OUT_AMT ,MEMO ,RGST_ID ,CHNG_ID from CPNAPP.USER_CHEAT where 1=1
AND CUST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CUST_NM},'%')
AND REPLACE(PHONE_NO,'-','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{PHONE_NO},'%')
order by 1 desc
